description.narrative: Girls, boys and women in affected areas have protected and reliable access to sufficient, safe water and sanitation and hygiene facilities,which contributes to Wash And Emergencies, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The Government of Ukraine's response to cthe conflict in Eastern Ukraine is supported through interventions in WASH, Child Protection, Education and Health sectors
